testcase.name: Hold Payment for Status Eligible to Disburse
testcase.system-out: Given Go to ISTools.........................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success..........................................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Real Time Disbursement"..............................passed And Select Menu "Partner Disbursement"......................................passed And Select STATUS "Eligible to disburse"....................................passed And Click button "Search"...................................................passed And Verify Search Result Presents...........................................passed And Click Checkbox..........................................................passed And Get Checkbox data of Menu "Partner Disbursement" before Hold Payment....passed And Click button "HOLD PAYMENT".............................................passed And Input reason of Hold Payment............................................passed And Click button "Yes"......................................................passed And Connect to Database RTD.................................................passed And Select Hold Contract Number and make sure status is Hold Payment Recreation.passed
